text: Robert Mueller declined to issue a grand-jury subpoena for Donald Trump’s testimony, and he excluded from his report a conclusion that Trump had committed crimes. These decisions are the most revealing features of Mueller’s tenure, @JeffreyToobin writes. https://t.co/CWeZs9DB9x
